Scent: Detect creatures via smell

Precise Bombs: May specify 2 squares in bomb splash radius that are unaffected

Swift Poisoning: May apply poison to a weapon as a swift action

Evasion (Master Chymist): Reflex save yields no damage instead of half in mutagenic form

Spell Slots: Alchemist1: 6; Alchemist2: 6; Alchemist3: 4; Alchemist4: 4; Alchemist5: 2 Spell DC: Alchemist: 12

Caster Level Bonus: +7 base class level for spells known and spells per day
Extended Mutagen: Dbl mutagen duration

Alchemy: May infuse extracts that duplicate spell effects for 1 dy
Arcane Spell Failure: 10%
Brew Potion: Create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Focused Spell: Chosen multi-target spell target suffers +2 save DC; uses +1 spell slot
Grand Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +6 AC and +8/+6/+4 to choices of strength, dexterity, and constitution and -2 to intelligence, wisdom, and charisma for 170 min
Greater Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +4 AC and +6/-2 and +4/-2 to strength/intelligence, dexterity/wisdom, or constitution/charisma for 170 min
Mutagen: May brew and drink potion that gives +2 AC and +4/-2 to strength/intelligence, dexterity/wisdom, or constitution/charisma for 340 min
Reach Spell: May cast spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Swift Alchemy: May create alchemical items in half normal time
